mapper.select:
SELECT A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk, A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, B.pic AS hotelPic , hotelRoomCost, avgStar, A.discount_per AS discountPer, reviewCount , F.address_name AS addressName
, IF(H.hotel_pk IS NULL, 0, 1) AS bookMark
FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_pic B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_reservation C ON A.hotel_pk = C.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.res_pk, round(AVG(A.score),1) AS avgStar, COUNT(A.review_pk) AS reviewCount FROM t_review A JOIN t_reservation B ON A.res_pk = B.res_pk GROUP BY B.hotel_pk ) D ON C.res_pk = D.res_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.hotel_pk, MIN(A.hotel_room_cost) AS hotelRoomCost FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_room_cost GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ) E ON A.hotel_pk = E.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where F ON A.hotel_pk = F.hotel_pk
LEFT JOIN t_user G ON A.user_pk = G.user_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_favorites H ON A.hotel_pk = H.hotel_pk AND H.user_pk = #{userPk}
WHERE A.advertise = 1 GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3

SELECT A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk, A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, B.pic AS hotelPic , hotelRoomCost, avgStar, A.discount_per AS discountPer, reviewCount , F.address_name AS addressName FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_pic B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_reservation C ON A.hotel_pk = C.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.res_pk, round(AVG(A.score),1) AS avgStar, COUNT(A.review_pk) AS reviewCount FROM t_review A JOIN t_reservation B ON A.res_pk = B.res_pk GROUP BY B.hotel_pk ) D ON C.res_pk = D.res_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.hotel_pk, MIN(A.hotel_room_cost) AS hotelRoomCost FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_room_cost GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ) E ON A.hotel_pk = E.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where F ON A.hotel_pk = F.hotel_pk GROUP BY A.hotel_pk
ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
ORDER BY avgStar DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT B.region_1depth_name AS address , C.size_pk AS dogSizePks FROM t_user A JOIN t_user_where B ON A.user_pk = B.user_pk LEFT JOIN t_user_dog C ON A.user_pk = C.user_pk WHERE A.user_pk = #{userPk} GROUP BY C.size_pk

SELECT A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk, A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, B.pic AS hotelPic , hotelRoomCost, avgStar, A.discount_per AS discountPer, reviewCount , G.address_name AS addressName, IF(I.hotel_pk IS NULL, 0, 1) AS bookMark FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_pic B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_reservation C ON A.hotel_pk = C.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.res_pk, round(AVG(A.score),1) AS avgStar, COUNT(A.review_pk) AS reviewCount FROM t_review A join t_reservation B ON A.res_pk = B.res_pk GROUP BY B.hotel_pk ) D ON C.res_pk = D.res_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.hotel_pk, MIN(A.hotel_room_cost) AS hotelRoomCost FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_room_cost GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ) E ON A.hotel_pk = E.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where G ON A.hotel_pk = G.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_user H ON A.user_pk = H.user_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_favorites I ON A.hotel_pk = I.hotel_pk AND I.user_pk = #{userPk} WHERE G.region_1depth_name = #{address} GROUP BY A.hotel_pk
ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
ORDER BY avgStar DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk, A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, B.pic AS hotelPic , hotelRoomCost, avgStar, A.discount_per AS discountPer, F.address_name AS addressName , IF(I.hotel_pk IS NULL, 0, 1) AS bookMark FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_pic B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_reservation C ON A.hotel_pk = C.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.res_pk, round(AVG(A.score),1) AS avgStar, COUNT(A.review_pk) AS reviewCount FROM t_review A join t_reservation B ON A.res_pk = B.res_pk GROUP BY B.hotel_pk ) D ON C.res_pk = D.res_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.hotel_pk, MIN(A.hotel_room_cost) AS hotelRoomCost FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_room_cost GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ) E ON A.hotel_pk = E.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where F ON A.hotel_pk = F.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_user H ON A.user_pk = H.user_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_favorites I ON A.hotel_pk = I.hotel_pk AND I.user_pk = #{userPk} WHERE A.hotel_nm REGEXP replace(${item}, ' ', '') GROUP BY A.hotel_pk
ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
ORDER BY avgStar DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk, A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, B.pic AS hotelPic , hotelRoomCost, avgStar, A.discount_per AS discountPer, F.address_name AS addressName , IF(I.hotel_pk IS NULL, 0, 1) AS bookMark FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_pic B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_reservation C ON A.hotel_pk = C.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.res_pk, round(AVG(A.score),1) AS avgStar, COUNT(A.review_pk) AS reviewCount FROM t_review A join t_reservation B ON A.res_pk = B.res_pk GROUP BY B.hotel_pk ) D ON C.res_pk = D.res_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.hotel_pk, MIN(A.hotel_room_cost) AS hotelRoomCost FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_room_cost GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ) E ON A.hotel_pk = E.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where F ON A.hotel_pk = F.hotel_pk
LEFT JOIN t_user H ON A.user_pk = H.user_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_favorites I ON A.hotel_pk = I.hotel_pk AND I.user_pk = #{userPk}
WHERE A.hotel_nm = #{search} GROUP BY A.hotel_pk
ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
ORDER BY avgStar DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk, A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, B.pic AS hotelPic, hotelRoomCost , avgStar, A.discount_per AS discountPer, G.address_name AS addressName
, IF(K.hotel_pk IS NULL, 0, 1) AS bookMark
FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_pic B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_reservation C ON A.hotel_pk = C.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.res_pk, round(AVG(A.score),1) AS avgStar, COUNT(A.review_pk) AS reviewCount FROM t_review A join t_reservation B ON A.res_pk = B.res_pk GROUP BY B.hotel_pk ) D ON C.res_pk = D.res_pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.hotel_pk, MIN(A.hotel_room_cost) AS hotelRoomCost FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_room_cost GROUP BY A.hotel_pk ) E ON A.hotel_pk = E.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where G ON A.hotel_pk = G.hotel_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_option H ON A.hotel_pk = H.hotel_pk
JOIN( SELECT A.hotel_pk, COUNT(A.hotel_pk) FROM t_hotel A JOIN t_hotel_option B ON A.hotel_pk = B.hotel_pk WHERE B.option_pk IN
#{item}
GROUP BY A.hotel_pk HAVING COUNT(A.hotel_pk) = #{optionPkSize} ) I ON A.hotel_pk = I.hotel_pk
LEFT JOIN t_user J ON A.user_pk = J.user_pk LEFT JOIN t_hotel_favorites K ON A.hotel_pk = K.hotel_pk AND K.user_pk = #{userPk}
G.region_1depth_name = #{address}
AND
A.hotel_pk in
#{item}
GROUP BY A.hotel_pk
ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
ORDER BY avgStar DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
LIMIT 0,12

SELECT A.hotel_pk FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel_room_info_date B ON A.hotel_room_pk = B.hotel_room_pk WHERE A.maximum > 1 AND #{allDogCount} >= A.maximum AND A.size_pk >= #{biggestDogSize} AND B.room_left_ea >= 1 AND B.room_date IN
#{item}

SELECT A.hotel_room_nm AS hotelRoomNm , B.hotel_left_ea AS roomLeftEa,B.room_date AS roomDate FROM t_hotel_room_info A JOIN t_hotel_res_room B ON A.hotel_room_pk=B.hotel_room_pk WHERE A.hotel_pk=#{hotelPk} AND A.book_able=1 AND (DATE(B.room_date) >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND DATE(B.room_date) <= DATE(#{endDate})) AND (A.size_pk >=#{howMany}) AND (A.maximum >=#{large})

SELECT A.hotel_room_nm AS hotelRoomNm , B.hotel_left_ea AS roomLeftEa,B.room_date AS roomDate FROM t_hotel_room_info A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_res_room B ON A.hotel_room_pk=B.hotel_room_pk WHERE A.hotel_pk=#{hotelPk} AND A.book_able=1 AND DATE(B.room_date) >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND DATE(B.room_date) <= DATE(#{endDate})

SELECT B.hotel_pk AS hotelPk,C.user_pk AS userPk,C.nickname AS nickName , A.comment,A.score,A.created_at AS createdAt,COUNT(D.review_pk) AS reviewFav FROM t_review A JOIN t_reservation B ON A.res_pk=B.res_pk JOIN t_user C ON C.user_pk=B.user_pk RIGHT JOIN t_review_fav D ON A.review_pk=D.review_pk WHERE B.hotel_pk=#{hotelPk} GROUP BY D.review_pk ORDER BY COUNT(D.review_pk) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm, A.hotel_detail_info AS hotelDetailInfo , A.business_num AS businessNum, A.hotel_call AS hotelCall , C.address_name AS roadAddress,C.detail_address AS addressDetail FROM t_hotel A LEFT JOIN t_hotel_where C ON A.hotel_pk=C.hotel_pk WHERE A.hotel_pk=#{hotelPk}
SELECT A.option_nm AS optionNm FROM t_option A JOIN t_hotel_option B ON A.option_pk=B.option_pk WHERE hotel_pk=#{hotelPk}
SELECT hotel_room_nm AS hotelRoomNm ,hotel_room_ea AS hotelRoomEA ,hotel_room_cost AS hotelRoomCost ,maximum ,room_pic AS roomPic FROM t_hotel_room_info WHERE hotel_pk=#{hotelPk}
SELECT user_dog_pk AS userDogPk , dog_nm AS dogNm, dog_pic AS dogPic, size_pk AS sizePk FROM t_user_dog WHERE user_pk=#{userPk}
SELECT COUNT(A.review_pk) AS countReview FROM t_review A JOIN t_reservation B ON A.res_pk=B.res_pk WHERE B.hotel_pk=#{hotelPk}
SELECT A.pics FROM t_review_pic A JOIN t_review B ON A.review_pk=B.review_pk JOIN t_reservation C ON C.res_pk=B.res_pk WHERE C.hotel_pk=#{hotelPk} AND C.user_pk=#{userPk}

SELECT A.hotel_nm AS hotelNm,D.hotel_pk AS hotelPic,A.hotel_pk AS hotelPk FROM t_hotel A JOIN t_hotel_favorites B ON A.hotel_pk=B.hotel_pk JOIN t_user C ON B.user_pk=C.user_pk JOIN t_hotel_pic D ON A.hotel_pk=D.hotel_pk WHERE B.user_pk=#{userPk} LIMIT #{fromPage}, #{endPage}
mapper.delete: DELETE t_hotel_pic WHERE hotel_pk = #{hotelPk} AND user_pk = #{userPk}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_hotel_res_room (hotel_room_pk , hotel_left_ea , room_date) VALUES
(#{hotelRoomPk} , #{hotelLeftEa} , #{date})
